entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
